interestingcomments.content:
Large diameter bearings in household products? /!/ I would like to design my 3d-printed joints/actuators around the bearings with the best availability/price ratio. Because this stuff really gets expensive a question arose in my mind: Are there any household items that unexpectedly contain bearings with large diameter?


For example any types of motors (vacuum, whiteware, ...) or parts from the automotive sector that contain interesting parts that a seriously undervalued if you find them on the scrap yard?
